foods.name: toor dal
foods.tips: Store in airtight container in cool, dry place. Keep away from moisture.

foods.name: moong dal
foods.tips: Store in airtight container. Lasts longer when kept dry.

foods.name: masoor dal
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container away from heat and humidity.

foods.name: chana dal
foods.tips: Store in airtight container in pantry.

foods.name: sabudana
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container. Very long shelf life if kept dry.

foods.name: bindi
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag in fridge. Use within 5 days for best quality.

foods.name: spinach
foods.tips: Keep in plastic bag in fridge crisper drawer.

foods.name: fenugreek leaves
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag. Use quickly for best freshness.

foods.name: coriander leaves
foods.tips: Keep in damp paper towel in plastic bag.

foods.name: paneer
foods.tips: Keep in sealed container. Can be frozen for 1-2 months.

foods.name: milk
foods.tips: Keep at back of fridge. Check expiry date on package.

foods.name: yogurt
foods.tips: Keep sealed. Do not freeze. Use before date on package.

foods.name: ghee
foods.tips: Store in cool place. Solidifies in cold, liquefies in heat. Very stable.

foods.name: coconut oil
foods.tips: Solidifies below 75Â°F. Store in cool, dry place.

foods.name: mustard seeds
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container away from light and heat.

foods.name: cumin seeds
foods.tips: Store in airtight container. Lasts very long when kept dry.

foods.name: turmeric powder
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container away from moisture and light.

foods.name: red chili powder
foods.tips: Store in cool, dry place. Lose potency over time.

foods.name: coriander powder
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container. Best used within 6 months.

foods.name: garam masala
foods.tips: Store in airtight container away from heat and light.

foods.name: rice
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container. White rice lasts longer than brown rice.

foods.name: wheat flour
foods.tips: Store in airtight container in cool place. Keep away from pests.

foods.name: besan
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container. Can go rancid if not stored properly.

foods.name: semolina
foods.tips: Store in airtight container away from moisture.

foods.name: eggs
foods.tips: Keep in original carton in coldest part of fridge. Check date on carton.

foods.name: tomato
foods.tips: Keep at room temperature away from direct sunlight. Refrigerate if overripe.

foods.name: onion
foods.tips: Store in cool, dark, well-ventilated place. Keep separate from potatoes.

foods.name: potato
foods.tips: Store in cool, dark place. Do not refrigerate. Keep away from onions.

foods.name: garlic
foods.tips: Store in cool, dark, well-ventilated place. Keep in paper bag.

foods.name: ginger
foods.tips: Wrap in paper towel and store in plastic bag in fridge.

foods.name: broccoli
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag in fridge crisper. Do not wash before storing.

foods.name: carrot
foods.tips: Remove greens. Store in plastic bag in crisper drawer.

foods.name: cauliflower
foods.tips: Keep in plastic bag. Do not wash before storing.

foods.name: bell pepper
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag in crisper drawer.

foods.name: cucumber
foods.tips: Keep in plastic bag. Use quickly for best crispness.

foods.name: lettuce
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag in crisper. Do not wash before storing.

foods.name: apple
foods.tips: Keep in plastic bag in crisper. Separate from other fruits.

foods.name: banana
foods.tips: Keep at room temperature. Refrigerate to slow ripening.

foods.name: mango
foods.tips: Keep at room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate.

foods.name: orange
foods.tips: Store in plastic bag in fridge. Keep separate from other fruits.

foods.name: lemon
foods.tips: Keep in plastic bag in fridge. Very long shelf life.

foods.name: bread
foods.tips: Keep in cool place. Refrigerate to extend life. Can freeze for months.

foods.name: butter
foods.tips: Keep sealed. Store at back of fridge. Can be frozen for 6-9 months.

foods.name: cheese
foods.tips: Keep wrapped. Separate cheeses to prevent cross-contamination.

foods.name: chickpeas
foods.tips: Store dried chickpeas in airtight container. Canned keep 2-5 years.

foods.name: kidney beans
foods.tips: Keep dried beans in airtight container in cool, dry place.

foods.name: black lentils
foods.tips: Store in airtight container. Used for dal makhani.

foods.name: peanuts
foods.tips: Store in airtight container in cool place. Can go rancid if not stored properly.

foods.name: cashews
foods.tips: Keep in airtight container. Best stored in cool place.

foods.name: almonds
foods.tips: Store in airtight container. Keep away from moisture and heat.
